BAD GIRLS - SERIES 7 - UNCUT - 12 EPISODES + BONUS CHRISTMAS SPECIAL 13TH EPISODE + BONUS FEATURES

GENIUNE DVD RIP
FORMAT: AVI
LANGUAGE: ENGLISH
CODEC: DIVX

BAD GIRLS is the smash hit ITV drama series set behind the bars of a women's prison. Seperated from their homes, children and lovers, the women struggle to cope with the harsh reality of this hidden world. BAD GIRLS doesn't shy away from portraying the cruelties and tense relationships inside the prison system, but it also captures the warmth and humour needed to survive it.

BAD GIRLS is back for a seventh series with Jim Fenner facing life on the other side of the bars. As an ex-screw, Jim's a lamb to the slaughter and soon he's begging for protection in the segregation block - along with the paedophiles and rapists. For Jim, there's only one way out - death or escape. Also, just when Sylvia Hollamby thinks her life is going to be ruined by an evil 'voodoo curse', her luck changes. The dashing Dr Malcolm Nicholson seems to have fallen for her and Sylvia is over the moon. Meanwhile, the two new inmates, credit card fraudsters Janine Nebeski and Arun Parmar, arrive on G Wing. Janine hates Arun for 'fessing up' in the witness box and she's bent on bloody revenge....

EPISODE 1
Rogue guard Jim Fenner is banged up in a men's prison getting the comeuppance he deserves whilst two new inmates, Arun Parmar and Janine Nebeski, arrive on G-Wing.

EPISODE 2
Jim Fenner is out of jail and smelling of roses - he's been re-instated in his old job and for the moment, it looks like nobody can smart him.

EPISODE 3
Naive Arun walks straight into a violent trap set up by Janine and Natalie Buxton, who beat her to a pulp.

EPISODE 4
Outside the heavy gates of Larkhall a swarm of press await the arrival of 18 year old Laura Canning, who has been convicted of brutally stabbing her mother to death.

EPISODE 5
Natalie is keen to show new arrival, Nun Sister Thomas, that a habit is no protection from the evils of G-Wing.

EPISODE 6
A new tough inmate, Pat Kerrigan, arrives at Larkhall transferred from another prison. Pat has an ulterior motive and will stop at nothing to get what she came for.

EPISODE 7
After stepping in to defend Arun it's not long before Pat is forced to face down Natalie to sort it out once and for all. Will Pat be strong enough to beat her?

EPISODE 8
Di's marriage is now in meltdown as husband Jim can't believe she's taken Dylan from his mother.... especially as she has no idea how to look after a baby.

EPISODE 9
Luckily Bev Tull is quick to the rescue when Frank tries to rape Phyl Oswyn and her daring action proves fruitful when they suddenly realise they are staring freedom in the face and sunny Spain beckons.

EPISODE 10
Jim Fenner is living on borrowed time, the whole of G-Wing want him dead. Even the screws have had enough of his evil, bullying ways... but who will do the deed?

EPISODE 11
Who killed Jim Fenner? An investigation starts but things are made difficult when all the inmates confess. Also, it is the first day of the new Wing Governor, Joy Masterson. She is ex-army and hard as nails.

EPISODE 12
Di has been accused of murdering Fenner and no one believes she is innocent. Now on the wrong side of the bars, how can she survive amongst the women she used to reign over?

EPISODE 13 **CHRISTMAS SPECIAL**
A sinister presence inhabits Larkhall on Christmas Eve - will they make it through the night?


BONUS SPECIAL FEATURES:
 - Bonus Episode: Christmas Special (Episode 13)
 - Photo Gallery


CAST: Victoria Alcock, Amanda Barrie, Stephanie Beacham, Danielle Brent, Victoria Bush, Pauline Campbell, Jack Ellis, Helen Fraser, James Gaddas, Zoe Lucker, Charlotte Lucas, Kika Mirylees, Jennifer Ness, Antonio Okonma, Eva Pope, Tristian Sturrock & Tracey Wilkinson
